## MediaDeviceSelect (component)

The MediaDeviceSelect list all media devices of one kind. Clicking on one of the listed devices make it the active media device.

### Import

```typescript
import { MediaDeviceSelect } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <MediaDeviceSelect kind="audioinput" />
</LiveKitRoom>
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                          | Modifiers | Type                                      | Description  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| [initialSelection?](./react//components-react.mediadeviceselectprops.initialselection.md)         |           | string                                    | _(Optional)_ |
| [kind](./react//components-react.mediadeviceselectprops.kind.md)                                  |           | MediaDeviceKind                           |              |
| [onActiveDeviceChange?](./react//components-react.mediadeviceselectprops.onactivedevicechange.md) |           | (deviceId: string) =&gt; void             | _(Optional)_ |
| [onDeviceListChange?](./react//components-react.mediadeviceselectprops.ondevicelistchange.md)     |           | (devices: MediaDeviceInfo\[\]) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ |
